TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataTemplate extends System.Windows.DataTemplate

summary.span: 表示支持 的 ，例如 或 。

span.span: Represents a that supports , such as or .

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，`ListLeagueList` 是 `League` 对象的列表。In the following example, `ListLeagueList` is a list of `League` objects. 每个 `League` 对象都有一个 `Name` 和 `Division` 对象的集合。Each `League` object has a `Name` and a collection of `Division` objects. 每个 `Division` 都有一个 `Name` 和 `Team` 对象的集合，并且每个 `Team` 对象都有一个 `Name`。Each `Division` has a `Name` and a collection of `Team` objects, and each `Team` object has a `Name`. [!code-xaml[HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet#HDT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#hdt)] 该示例演示了使用 ，可以轻松地显示包含其他列表的列表数据。The example shows that with the use of , you can easily display list data that contains other lists. 下面是该示例的一个屏幕快照。The following is a screenshot of the example. ![HierarchicalDataTemplate 示例屏幕快照](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate 示例屏幕快照")![HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot")

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified type for which the template is intended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `dataType` 参数可以是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 对象或表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 元素的字符串。The `dataType` parameter is either a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object or a string representing an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[绑定源概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview)。For more information, see [Binding Sources Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置子项的交替项容器的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of alternating item containers for the child items.

value.span: 下一级项的交替项容器的数量。

span.span: The number of alternating item containers for the next level of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 和 属性可以指定两个或多个交替项容器的外观。The and properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers. 例如，您可以为 中的每个第三项指定交替的背景色。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an . 分配给 中的每个项容器。The is assigned to each item container in the . 从0开始，递增，直到 减1，然后重新从0开始。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果 为3，并且 中有七项，则下表列出每个项的 。For example, if is 3 and there are seven items in the , the following table lists the for each item. |项在 中的位置Position of Item in the || |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 设置 "" 属性时，指示子项应获取该范围内的 ，而不是应用此 项的项。When you set the property, you are indicating that the child items should get an in that range, not the item that has this applied to it. 例如，如果 调用 `aHeaderedItemsControl` 将 与 集一起使用，则 `aHeaderedItemsControl` 的子项的项容器将具有 ，而不是 `aHeaderedItemsControl`的项容器。For example, if a called `aHeaderedItemsControl` uses a with the set, the item containers of the child items of `aHeaderedItemsControl` will have an , not the item container for `aHeaderedItemsControl`. 您可以使用几种方法为交替项容器指定不同的外观。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers. 一种方法是将 items 容器的属性绑定到 。One method is to bind properties of the items container to the . 然后，可以使用 指定应将哪个值应用到具有特定 值的项容器。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain value. 你还可以使用触发器来更改项容器的属性的值，具体取决于其 的值。You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下面的示例创建绑定到深度为三层的数据的 ，每个项都显示在 中。The following example creates a that is bound to data that is three levels deep, and each item is displayed in a . 第一个级别中的 对象具有相同的属性值，第二个级别中的 对象使用 属性的交替值，第三个级别中的 对象使用 属性的交替值。The objects in the first level have the same property values, the objects in the second level use alternating values for the property, and the objects in the third level use alternating values for the property. 由于第一级的 `Level1Data`将 属性设置为2，因此第二个级别中 对象的 会在0和1之间交替。Because the for the first level, `Level1Data`, has the property set to 2, the for the objects in the second level alternates between 0 and 1. 在第二级的 中，`Level2Data`， 的 绑定到 ，并提供 以将 转换为替换 。In the for the second level, `Level2Data`, the of the is bound to the and an is provided to convert the to an alternating . `Level2Data` 和 `Level3Data`之间存在类似的关系： 在 `Level2Data`上设置为3， 中的 `Level3Ddata` 的 属性绑定到 。A similar relationship exists between `Level2Data` and `Level3Data`: The is set to 3 on `Level2Data`, and the in `Level3Ddata` has its property bound to the . [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置复制到每个子项的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is copied to each child item.
The that is copied to each child item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性时，每个项容器均获取与 具有相同 对象的 ，但描述绑定中的数据的属性（如 和 ）特定于 中每个项的数据。When you set the property, each item container gets a that has the same objects as the , but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as and , are specific to the data for each item in the . 您必须访问项容器的 以执行操作，例如验证数据和检查项是否有错误。You must access the item container's to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于每个子项的项容器的

span.span: Gets or sets the that is applied to the item container for each child item.

value.span: 应用于每个子项的项容器的 。

span.span: The that is applied to the item container for each child item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性或 属性设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。You use this property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于 ，生成的容器是 控件;对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，该对象对其第一个级别中的项使用一个样式，并为其第二个级别中的项使用另一个样式。The following example creates a that uses one style for items in its first level and another style for items in its second level. 第一级的样式是在 的 属性中设置的。The style for the first level is set in the property of the . 第二级的样式是在 的 属性中设置的。The style for the second level is set in the property of the . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizingTreeView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizingtreeview)] 下面的示例创建了上一示例中使用的数据。The following example creates the data that is used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#treeviewdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#treeviewdata)]

summary.span: 获取或设置可应用于每个项容器的样式的自定义样式选择逻辑。

span.span: Gets or sets custom style-selection logic for a style that can be applied to each item container.

value.span: 一个 ，用来选择将哪种样式用作 。

span.span: A that chooses which style to use as the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以设置样式，以影响包含数据项的元素的外观。You use the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，对于 ，生成的容器是 控件;对于 ，它们是 控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 如果定义了多个样式，并且需要提供逻辑来选择要应用的样式，则使用 属性，而不是 属性。If you have more than one style defined and need to supply logic to choose which one to apply, then you use the property instead of the property. 请注意，如果设置 属性，则忽略此属性。Note that this property is ignored if the property is set. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，该使用 的 在 第二级中的项的两种样式之间进行选择。The following example creates a that uses the of a to choose between two styles for items in the second level of the . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ItemContainerStyleSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemcontainerstyleselector)] 下面的示例显示了上一示例中使用的 。The following example shows the that is used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewItemStyleSelector](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#treeviewitemstyleselector)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewItemStyleSelector](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#treeviewitemstyleselector)] 下面的示例创建了上一示例中使用的数据。The following example creates the data that is used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#treeviewdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#TreeViewData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#treeviewdata)]

summary.span: 获取或设置此数据模板的绑定，该绑定指示在何处可以找到表示数据层次结构中下一级别的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding for this data template, which indicates where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这会应用于生成的 （例如 或 ）上的 属性，以指示在何处查找表示数据层次结构中的下一个级别的集合。This is applied to the property on a generated (such as a or a ) to indicate where to find the collection that represents the next level in the data hierarchy. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的信息，请参阅 类型。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see the type. ## Examples 在以下示例中，`ListLeagueList` 是 `League` 对象的列表。In the following example, `ListLeagueList` is a list of `League` objects. 每个 `League` 对象都有一个 `Name` 和 `Division` 对象的集合。Each `League` object has a `Name` and a collection of `Division` objects. 每个 `Division` 都有一个 `Name` 和 `Team` 对象的集合，并且每个 `Team` 对象都有一个 `Name`。Each `Division` has a `Name` and a collection of `Team` objects, and each `Team` object has a `Name`. [!code-xaml[HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet#HDT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HierarchicalDataTemplateSnippet/CS/window1.xaml#hdt)] 该示例演示了使用 ，可以轻松地显示包含其他列表的列表数据。The example shows that with the use of , you can easily display list data that contains other lists. 下面是该示例的一个屏幕快照。The following is a screenshot of the example. ![HierarchicalDataTemplate 示例屏幕快照](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate 示例屏幕快照")![HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot](~/add/media/databinding-hierarchicaldatatemplate.png "HierarchicalDataTemplate sample screen shot")
